title: Knowledge Representation and Reasoning
description: Knowledge representation methods and reasoning techniques

chapters.title: Chapter 1: Introduction to Knowledge Representation
chapters.description: Introduction to basic concepts of knowledge representation, including the differences between AI, machine learning, and knowledge representation, and the importance of declarative knowledge

lessons.title: 1.1 Knowledge Representation vs Machine Learning vs Artificial Intelligence
lessons.content: Knowledge representation is how real-world knowledge is encoded into forms that computers can process in artificial intelligence. Learn various knowledge representation methods.

lessons.title: 1.2 Declarative Knowledge vs Procedural Knowledge
lessons.content: Learn the basic concepts, syntax and semantics of first-order predicate logic, understand how to represent knowledge using logic.

chapters.title: Chapter 2: Prolog Basics
chapters.description: Learn the basics of Prolog programming language, including syntax, facts, rules and queries

lessons.title: 2.1 Prolog Syntax Basics
lessons.content: Learn the basic syntax of Prolog language, including writing facts, rules and queries.

lessons.title: 2.2 Facts and Rules
lessons.content: Learn the representation and operations of lists in Prolog, including recursion and pattern matching.

chapters.title: Chapter 3: Prolog Debugging
chapters.description: Learn debugging techniques and common errors in Prolog programs

chapters.title: Chapter 4: Prolog Structures and Matching
chapters.description: In-depth study of compound structures and pattern matching in Prolog

chapters.title: Chapter 5: Prolog Lists and Operators
chapters.description: Learn list representation, operations and operator usage in Prolog

chapters.title: Chapter 6: Prolog Negation
chapters.description: Learn negation operations in Prolog and negation handling in logic programming

chapters.title: Chapter 7: Midterm Review
chapters.description: Comprehensive review of the first six chapters, preparing for midterm exam
